query.statement:
SELECT A.WRKLFN ,(SELECT B.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 B WHERE B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.LIFNR = A.WRKLFN) WRKLFN_NM ,A.PSPID ,(SELECT DISTINCT C.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C WHERE C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.POSID = A.PSPID) PSPID_NM ,A.INSDT ,A.WRKTX ,SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(WAERS,TWBTR) TWBTR ,A.BLDAT ,CASE WHEN A.STATE = '1' THEN '입력' WHEN A.STATE = '2' OR A.STATE = '3' THEN '완료' END STATE ,A.HKONT ,A.SEQNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0127 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.POSID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#
AND A.BLDAT BETWEEN #DATEF# AND #DATET#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.STATE IN ('1','2','3')
AND A.STATE IN ('1')
AND A.STATE IN ('2','3')
AND A.STATE IN ('1','2','3')
AND D.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
